verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with his hard <S%H7186><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H2389><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> will punish <S%H6485><s%> leviathan <S%H3882><s%> the swift <S%H1281><s%> serpent <S%H5175><s%>, and leviathan <S%H3882><s%> the crooked <S%H6129><s%> serpent <S%H5175><s%>; and he will slay <S%H2026><s%> the monster <S%H8577><s%> that is in the sea <S%H3220><s%>.
In that day <S%H3117><s%>: A vineyard <S%H3754><s%> of wine <S%H2561><s%>, sing ye unto it <S%H6031><s%>.

I Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> am its keeper <S%H5341><s%>; I will water <S%H8248><s%> it every moment <S%H7281><s%>: lest any hurt <S%H6485><s%> it <S%H5341><s%>, I will keep it night <S%H3915><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%>.

Wrath <S%H2534><s%> is not in me <S%H5414><s%>: would that the briers <S%H8068><s%> and thorns <S%H7898><s%> were against me in battle <S%H4421><s%>! I would march <S%H6585><s%> upon them <S%H6702><s%>, I would burn them together <S%H3162><s%>.
Or else let him take hold <S%H2388><s%> of my strength <S%H4581><s%>, that he may make <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with me <S%H6213><s%>; yea, let him make peace with me <S%H7965><s%>.

In days to come <S%H935><s%> shall Jacob <S%H3290><s%> take root <S%H8327><s%>; Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall blossom <S%H6692><s%> and bud <S%H6524><s%>; and they shall fill <S%H4390><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> with fruit <S%H8570><s%>.

Hath he smitten <S%H5221><s%> them as he smote <S%H4347><s%> those that smote <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H2026><s%>? or are they slain according to the slaughter <S%H2027><s%> of them that were slain by them <S%H2026><s%>?

In measure <S%H5432><s%>, when thou sendest <S%H7971><s%> them away <S%H7378><s%>, thou dost contend with them <S%H1898><s%>; he hath removed them with his rough <S%H7186><s%> blast <S%H7307><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the east wind <S%H6921><s%>.

Therefore by this <S%H2063><s%> shall the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> be forgiven <S%H3722><s%>, and this is all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of taking away <S%H5493><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%>: that he maketh <S%H7760><s%> all the stones <S%H68><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> as chalkstones <S%H1615><s%> that are beaten in sunder <S%H5310><s%>, so that the Asherim <S%H842><s%> and the sun-images <S%H2553><s%> shall rise no more <S%H6965><s%>.

For the fortified <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> is solitary <S%H910><s%>, a habitation <S%H5116><s%> deserted <S%H5800><s%> and forsaken <S%H7971><s%>, like the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: there shall the calf <S%H5695><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%>, and there shall he lie down <S%H7257><s%>, and consume <S%H3615><s%> the branches thereof <S%H5585><s%>.

When the boughs <S%H7105><s%> thereof are withered <S%H3001><s%>, they shall be broken off <S%H7665><s%>; the women <S%H802><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and set them on fire <S%H215><s%>; for it is a people <S%H5971><s%> of no understanding <S%H998><s%>: therefore he that made <S%H6213><s%> them will not have compassion <S%H7355><s%> upon them <S%H3335><s%>, and he that formed them will show them no favor <S%H2603><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will beat off <S%H2251><s%> his fruit from the flood <S%H7641><s%> of the River <S%H5104><s%> unto the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and ye shall be gathered <S%H3950><s%> one <S%H259><s%> by one <S%H259><s%>, O ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that a great <S%H1419><s%> trumpet <S%H7782><s%> shall be blown <S%H8628><s%>; and they shall come <S%H935><s%> that were ready to perish <S%H6><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and they that were outcasts <S%H5080><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and they shall worship <S%H7812><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
